verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Let the heavens rejoice,
And let the earth be glad.
Let the sea roar, and the fullness thereof.
Let the field be joyful, and all that is therein.
Then shall all the trees of the wood
Rejoice before the Lord.
Singing, Al-le-lu, Al-le-lu-jah praise the Lord;
Al-le-lu, Al-le-lu-jah say Amen.
Al-le-lu, Al-le-lu-jah praise the Lord;
Let the heavens rejoice; let the earth be glad.
Let the sea roar and the field be joyful.
Let all the trees of the wood rejoice and say Amen.
